name: Delete (itch) (Trash7Can)
description:
A game that is about matching numbers

Delete is a game that you are given with a table of numbers and asked to clear them in pairs as many as you can. As infinite rows of numbers can be generated, there is no ending until you are stuck without moves

This game allows you to customise the numbers that will generate and create special pairing conditions. During the game, you have to save manually and clearing a row is inreversible

This game requires Python 3.8 or higher and Pygame (Recommend Pygame 2) to run.

(And yes you can run it on Windows 7)
